title: Sublime Text Menu

args.description: Arguments to pass to the command to execute

caption.description: A text of the menu entry

checkbox.description: An item is a checkbox type if true

children.description: A list of menu entries to create a submenu from

command.description: A string of the command to execute when the entry is activated

id.markdownDescription: A unique string for the menu entry. Used for menu entries with `children` to allow adding additional child entries.

mnemonic.markdownDescription: A character to use as the key to press to activate the entry. Only applies to Windows and Linux. Must match the case of the character in the `caption`.

platform.markdownDescription: One of the strings: `OSX`, `!OSX`, `Windows`, `!Windows`, `Linux` or `!Linux`. Controls what platforms the entry is shown on.

description: Specifies a menu that can either modify  in the application
